result.title: Grand Prix of Azov Sea: status change
result.content:
The Grand Prix of Azov Sea, planned for Apr 22, 2018, 11:00 Moscow Time will be official only for Division 2 teams, because significant part of Div 1 participants are on their way from ICPC World Finals in Beijing, China. Note that Division 2 competition for the GP of Moscow was not working due to technical reasons, so the Grand Prix of Azov Sea will be 18'th stage of this season (and then numbef of stages for both divisions become equal again).

For the Division 1 teams will be held unofficial Grand Prix of Azov Sea, and it will be the online selection round for the Ural Championship. Onsite part of the championship will be held at May 11-13 in Ufa, Bashkortostan. The link to the round will be put into the same place as usual official Div1 link.
